name: toddy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a drink made of spirits (= strong alcoholic drink) mixed with hot water and sugar, sometimes with different flavours added: After the swim in the icy water we all had a hot toddy to warm us up.
an alcoholic drink made from the sap (= the liquid inside a plant) of certain types of palm tree: The local workers used to make palm toddy from the coconut palms.
More examplesFewer examplesMy dad would come home with a few toddies (recipe: bourbon, lemon juice, honey, water) in him, and we'd all sing together.When I was a kid my dad made a hot toddy when I had a cold.The evening in the O'Driscoll house was wonderful, too, drinking whiskey toddy for old times' sake.There were toddy sellers beneath the banyan and tamarind trees.
